mods.abstract: Includes: Psychology and scientific research, by Hadley Cantril, Adelbert Ames, Jr., Albert H. Hastorf and William H. Ittelson; The perception of movement, by F.P. Kilpatrick and William H. Ittelson; Hittelson, William H. Size as a cue to distance; Accommodation, convergence, and apparent distance, by William H. Ittelson and Adelbert Ames, Jr.; Ames, Adelbert, Jr. Aniseikonic glasses; Ittelson, William H. The temporal course of perception; The monocular and bionocular distorted rooms, by William H. Ittelson and F.P. Kilpatrick; Ames, Adelbert, Jr. The rotating trapezoid; Ames, Adelbert, Jr. Ultra-stimulus perception; The learning of values: an experimental inquiry, by Hans H. Toch and Hadley Cantril; Ittleson, William H. The constancies in visual perception; The constancies in social perception, by F.P. Kilpatrick and Hadley Cantril.
